abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders beat Minnesota Wild, 5-3; other pro hockey news noted.

headline.print_headline: Nelson Scores His 20th Goal as Islanders Defeat the Wild
headline.main: Brock Nelson Scores His 20th Goal as Islanders Defeat the Wild

snippet: Nelson, the team’s leading scorer, broke a tie late in the second period, while Frans Nielsen and John Tavares added goals in the third to seal the Islanders’ win over visiting Minnesota.
lead_paragraph: Nelson, the team’s leading scorer, broke a tie late in the second period, while Frans Nielsen and John Tavares added goals in the third to seal the Islanders’ win over visiting Minnesota.
